    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91009</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Reflection of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre comment le garçon voit l'image de sa bouche sur un miroir. La lumière de l'ampoule illumine la bouche et est reflétée sur le miroir et dans ses yeux.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how the boy sees the image of his mouth through a mirror.  Light from the bulb illuminates the mouth and is reflected to the mirror and to his eyes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle de réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">angle of reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ampoule</string>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie der Junge das Bild 
seiner Öffnung durch einen Spiegel sieht. Licht von der Birne 
belichtet die Öffnung und wird zum Spiegel und an seine Augen 
mitgeteilt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como o menino vê a imagem 
de sua boca através de um espelho. A luz do bulbo ilumina a 
boca e é refletida ao espelho e a seus olhos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come il ragazzo vede 
l'immagine della sua bocca tramite uno specchio. La luce dalla 
lampadina illumina la bocca ed è riflessa allo specchio ed ai suoi 
occhi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς το αγόρι 
βλέπει την εικόνα του στόματός του μέσω ενός καθρέφτη. 
Το φως από το βολβό φωτίζει το στόμα και απεικονίζεται στον
καθρέφτη και στα μάτια του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo el muchacho ve la 
imagen de su boca a través de un espejo. La luz del bulbo 
ilumina la boca y se refleja al espejo y a sus ojos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel der Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo de incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo de reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bulbo</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
